farm.name: Farm
farm.description: Nestled amidst open fields, the farm is a lifeline for the town, producing fresh crops and bringing families together in shared labor and celebration of the land.

inn.name: Inn
inn.description: A haven for locals and travellers alike, the inn stands as a cornerstone of the community, a place where the weary find respite and the curious find intrigue.

barracks.name: Barracks
barracks.description: Inside the barracks, the clamor of armor and weapons is constant, a reassuring sound for some and a reminder of authority's ever-watchful presence for others.

smithy.name: Smithy
smithy.description: Billowing smoke and glowing embers mark the heart of the smithy, where metal meets fire to create everything from horseshoes to blades.

brothel.name: Brothel
brothel.description: Whispers of discontent fill the streets as the brothel flourishes, a gilded cage where the powerful indulge while the common folk see their dignity sold one night at a time.

watchtower.name: Watchtower
watchtower.description: Perched on high, the watchtower offers a clear view of the horizon, but its cold, unyielding gaze leaves many feeling watched rather than protected.

orphanage.name: Orphanage
orphanage.description: A place of refuge for those without families, the orphanage provides care for the town’s lost children, though whispers from the guilds bemoan the loss of cheap labor.

monument.name: Monument
monument.description: A symbol of the town’s might and wealth, the monument inspires awe in some but frustration in others, who see it as an unnecessary display of vanity.

graveyard.name: Graveyard
graveyard.description: The graveyard stands as a solemn reminder of lives past, a quiet place of reflection that fosters unity among the living through shared grief and memory.

library.name: Library
library.description: The library stands as a testament to the value of knowledge, where every book and tome represents a step toward a brighter, more enlightened future.

sewerSystem.name: Sewer System
sewerSystem.description: Beneath the town, the newly constructed sewer system flows—a marvel of engineering that improves health and cleanliness, though its hidden depths harbor unseen secrets.

school.name: School
school.description: While the school strengthens the community and pushes for progress, it also teaches the value of questioning authority—something not all are eager to see.

jail.name: Jail
jail.description: Behind its barred windows, the jail holds those who defy the law, its presence a quiet warning to any who might challenge the town’s authority.

stables.name: Stables
stables.description: The stables provide not only shelter for horses but also serve as a hub for the town’s mounted forces, ensuring swift responses to any threats.

fightingPit.name: Fighting Pit
fightingPit.description: The fighting pit draws crowds and coin alike, but some fear its focus on bloodsport dulls the town’s desire for anything more meaningful.

dwarvenBrewery.name: Dwarven Brewery
dwarvenBrewery.description: The air around the Dwarven Brewery is always thick with the smell of brewing ale. It is a place where dwarven tradition meets celebration, its warm hearth a beacon on cold nights.
dwarvenBrewery.buildingEffectDescription: 8 bottles of the legendary Bugman’s Ale become available for purchase each month.
